headline: Was Jim Cramer Right About AMETEK (AME) Stock?
summary: Back in 2024, on May 14, a caller asked about AMETEK, Inc (NYSE:AME), praising its chart and its role in electromechanical devices and gas analyzers for the semiconductor industry at the time. Cramer was enthusiastic back then, saying: “Oh man, come on, AME? Just one of the great industrials too. I mean, absolutely terrific company. […]
